name: OnlyOffice Docserver
description: ONLYOFFICE Docs, a powerful online editor for text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, forms and PDF for the platform you use
longDescription: Create complex documents, professional spreadsheets, stunning presentations. Build fillable forms and fill them in online. View and edit PDFs, export/import to/from PDF. Convert docs to Markdown and HTML. Turn your textbooks into e-books.
